turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get coffee in Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order for you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, i'm placing that order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a tall cappuccino with soy milk to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, your coffee will be ready for pickup in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, thank you. Have a nice day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, sure. Have a nice day.
